thread.title: Remember The Time Bill Clinton Got A Standing Ovation For "Cracking Down On Illegal Aliens"
thread.title_full: Remember The Time Bill Clinton Got A Standing Ovation For "Cracking Down On Illegal Aliens"

author: Tyler Durden
title: Remember The Time Bill Clinton Got A Standing Ovation For "Cracking Down On Illegal Aliens"
text:
BIG MOVEMENT AHEAD IN THE SILVER MARKET… Serious Trouble In The Paper Markets by SRSrocco - Jan 29, 2017 4:23 PM 
The Silver Market will experience a significant trend change in the future due the unraveling of the paper markets by The_Real_Fly - Jan 29, 2017 4:52 PM 
Digital finance is in desperate need of a market crash. by ZeroPointNow - Jan 29, 2017 4:07 AM 
That face... Remember The Time Bill Clinton Got A Standing Ovation (For "Cracking Down On Abuse Of Our Immigration Laws") Jan 29, 2017 10:10 PM 0 
Before Trump , there was President Obama's Iraqi refugee ban and seven nations of terror proclamation . 
But before Obama there was Bill Clinton who received a standing ovation for demanding stronger border defenses, and deporting criminal illegal immigrants... WATCH????: Bill Clinton got a STANDING OVATION to the idea of building a wall, & deporting illegals committing crimes. pic.twitter.com/3l5CLh3I99 
— NIRP Umbrella (@NIRPUmbrella) January 29, 2017 

"We are a nation of immigrants.. but we are a nation of laws" 

" Our nation is rightly disturbed by the large numbers of illegal aliens entering our country... 

Illegal immigrants take jobs from citizens or legal immigrants, they impose burdens on our taxpayers... 

That is why we are doubling the number of border guards , deporting more illegal immigrants than ever before, cracking down on illegal hiring, barring benefits to illegal aliens, and we will do more to speed the deportation of illegal immigrants arrest for crimes ... 

It is wrong and ultimately self-defeating for a nation of immigrants to permit the kind of abuse of our immigration laws that has occurred in the last few years.. and we must do more to stop it [Standing Ovation]" 
It's starting to get a little awkward for the identity politics of the left to defend their hypocritical history and still denigrate President Trump's actions.
